__e: They thought you got lost again, we were all worried about you.
I know you don't wanna hear this, but... the kid's gone again.
He seems to have disappeared again.
Has anyone else gone missing lately?
How could I? He'd been missing for 28 years.
Two years since you disappeared. Not a word.
I could disappear forever and it wouldn't make any difference.
If I did not want my son had a mother - - Were you disappeared long ago.
All they had to do was fake an escape to get you here, and now they have you.
I don't know if he's disappeared, but his family is a bit worried.
He has quite disappeared from our lives, I think.
That you were out of my life.
But they're gone from the world, along with much else.
'Cause your daughter's missing. Your wife is dead. You're taking it out on me.
My house is a refugee camp, and my wife has disappeared. No one in town knows where she is.
And yet they have disappeared and you don't know where.
